abbess.notes: Abbess is a strong damage dealer who excels at dealing burst or sustained damage. Prioritize critical rate to 100%, then stack critical damage and attack for maximum output. Speed boots ensure consistent turn cycling.

Abbess deals heavy damage in Clan Boss. Speed-tune to your Clan Boss team composition — this is mandatory for advanced CB. Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

Abbess deals heavy damage in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

Abbess deals heavy damage in Dungeons. Balance speed with survivability for consistent dungeon clears. Spider benefits from HP Burn or Enemy MAX HP champions. Fire Knight rewards multi-hitters in Relentless. Ice Golem needs block buffs or buff removal.

Abbess deals heavy damage in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

Chronicler Adelyn deals heavy damage in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

Chronicler Adelyn deals heavy damage in Dungeons. Balance speed with survivability for consistent dungeon clears. Spider benefits from HP Burn or Enemy MAX HP champions. Fire Knight rewards multi-hitters in Relentless. Ice Golem needs block buffs or buff removal.

Chronicler Adelyn deals heavy damage in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

Flesh-Tearer enables the team in Clan Boss. Speed-tune to your Clan Boss team composition — this is mandatory for advanced CB. Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

flesheater.notes: Flesheater is a niche support champion who provides buffs, debuffs, or healing to the team. Speed and accuracy are the top priorities to ensure debuffs land and abilities cycle quickly. Build tanky enough to survive.

fleshmonger.notes: Fleshmonger is a niche damage dealer who excels at dealing burst or sustained damage. Prioritize critical rate to 100%, then stack critical damage and attack for maximum output. Speed boots ensure consistent turn cycling.

Fleshmonger deals heavy damage in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

flinger.notes: Flinger is a niche damage dealer who excels at dealing burst or sustained damage. Prioritize critical rate to 100%, then stack critical damage and attack for maximum output. Speed boots ensure consistent turn cycling.

Fodbor the Bard deals heavy damage in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

Fodbor the Bard deals heavy damage in Dungeons. Balance speed with survivability for consistent dungeon clears. Spider benefits from HP Burn or Enemy MAX HP champions. Fire Knight rewards multi-hitters in Relentless. Ice Golem needs block buffs or buff removal.

Fodbor the Bard deals heavy damage in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

High Keeper Prysma enables the team in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

Lodric Falconheart offers strong survivability in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

loki-the-deceiver.notes: Loki the Deceiver is a strong support champion who provides buffs, debuffs, or healing to the team. Speed and accuracy are the top priorities to ensure debuffs land and abilities cycle quickly. Build tanky enough to survive.

Loki the Deceiver enables the team in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

Loki the Deceiver enables the team in Dungeons. Balance speed with survivability for consistent dungeon clears. Spider benefits from HP Burn or Enemy MAX HP champions. Fire Knight rewards multi-hitters in Relentless. Ice Golem needs block buffs or buff removal.

Loki the Deceiver enables the team in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

Skartorsis enables the team in Dungeons. Balance speed with survivability for consistent dungeon clears. Spider benefits from HP Burn or Enemy MAX HP champions. Fire Knight rewards multi-hitters in Relentless. Ice Golem needs block buffs or buff removal.

Skartorsis enables the team in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

skathix.notes: Skathix is a solid support champion who provides buffs, debuffs, or healing to the team. Speed and accuracy are the top priorities to ensure debuffs land and abilities cycle quickly. Build tanky enough to survive.

Skathix enables the team in Clan Boss. Speed-tune to your Clan Boss team composition — this is mandatory for advanced CB. Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

Wuji deals heavy damage in Clan Boss. Speed-tune to your Clan Boss team composition — this is mandatory for advanced CB. Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

Wuji deals heavy damage in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.

Wuji deals heavy damage in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

Wurlim Frostking provides defensive utility in Hydra. Accuracy is critical for landing debuffs on Hydra heads — aim for 350+ on Normal, 400+ on Hard. Relentless is strong for champions with key cooldowns or frequent debuffs. Build tanky to survive head slams and AoE damage.

maddak-eyes-of-skyiron.notes: Maddak, Eyes of Skyiron is a solid damage dealer who excels at dealing burst or sustained damage. Prioritize critical rate to 100%, then stack critical damage and attack for maximum output. Speed boots ensure consistent turn cycling.

Maddak, Eyes of Skyiron deals heavy damage in Clan Boss. Speed-tune to your Clan Boss team composition — this is mandatory for advanced CB. Unkillable/Myth teams prioritize damage sets (Savage/Cruel) on DPS and Speed/Accuracy for debuffers. Traditional teams without unkillable may prefer Lifesteal for sustain.

Maddak, Eyes of Skyiron deals heavy damage in Arena. Speed is king in Arena — go first or build tanky enough to survive the opener. Lethal/Savage sets maximize burst damage for nukers. Stoneskin dominates the defensive meta — build high resistance on defense teams.
